sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../components/About.css"; // Import the CSS file import img from "./img.jpeg"; const About = () => (
{/*

Summary

*/}

I am the Chief Technology Officer (CTO) at Starteryou Inc., where I lead the vision and strategy for an innovative platform connecting teenagers and college students with meaningful part-time job opportunities. I oversee software development, ensuring our technology stack aligns with business objectives, and drive continuous improvement in product offerings. Our stack includes React, Vite, Node.js, MongoDB, AWS (EC2, Docker), and HTTPS security, emphasizing scalability and efficiency. Previously, as a Research Assistant at Sacred Heart University, I contributed to a 50% reduction in laboratory accidents through innovative solutions. My work involved leveraging Python, R, and SQL for projects such as breast cancer prediction, sentiment analysis, and COVID-19 tweet modeling, consistently achieving high accuracy. In my Data Science Virtual Internship at British Airways, I honed skills in web scraping and predictive modeling using Beautiful Soup, Scikit-learn, and Random Forest. Additionally, during my four years as a Software Engineer at Cerner Corporation, I enhanced AI and ML-based life-saving technologies, improved data collection frameworks, and streamlined workflows. Proficient in Java, C, C++, C#, JavaScript, and big data technologies, I bring extensive experience in Agile development and semantic versioning. Passionate about leveraging data science and technology to solve real-world challenges, I am dedicated to driving innovation and making impactful contributions to the tech industry.

Publication:{" "} COVID-19 Vaccine Response on Social Media Using LDA Analysis

Certifications:{" "} MongoDB Certificates {" "} |{" "} Forage Certificates

); export default About;
